name: Skydiving Fever
description:
Enjoy the thrill of skydiving on your iPhone or iPad.

Lean your iPhone to adjust your movement during free fall. Touch the parachute pack to deploy your parachute. Lean your iPhone to control your descent as you try to land as close as possible to the target landing zone.

Do a tandem dive with an instructor, a solo dive, or with an online friend via the Apple Game Center.

Includes impact vibration on iPhone (not available on iPad).

Posts best scores and achievements to the Apple Game Center. Optionally shares your accomplishments with Facebook, Twitter, Weibo, email, or instant messaging (iOS 6+).

Allows video recording and sharing of your best skydives. (iOS 6+)

Universal App - supports iPhone, iPod Touch, and iPad, including standard, Retina, and iPhone 5 displays.

YouTube video: http://youtu.be/w3ynKBSt5po
